p: Mouse 3T3-L1 preadipocytes were obtained from the American Type Culture Collection (ATCC©, Manassas, VA, USA). Cells were grown in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium containing 25 mM glucose, 10% heat-inactivated fetal bovine serum, 5 mM L-glutamine, 2 µg/mL streptomycin and 0.03 µg/mL penicillin (Pan Biotech, Dutscher, Brumath, France). Cells were maintained in a humidified 5% CO 2 incubator at 37 °C.
